Class Expense

java.lang.Object
models.Expense
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Expense extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an expense entry in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system. Stores category, amount, date, payment method, and recurrence status.
See Also:
